</title>

<traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 587 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 975 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The religious symbol of [Torag](/Deities.aspx?ID=18), the forge god—an ornate hammer of dwarven construction—adorns the face of this reinforced [steel shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 10, HP 40, BT 20). The shield is a [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of Torag.

 You and any adjacent allies have fire resistance 5 while you have the shield raised. When used for a [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839), the _forge warden_ rings out like the hammer strike of a blacksmith, and the symbol glows as if lit by the fires of a furnace.
